text: The 4 × 100 metres relay at the Olympics of Grace was held in Florence at the ASSI Giglio Rosso from 30 to 31 May 1931. On 30 May 1931 semi-finals were held during the afternoon session and the final was held the day afterwards during the afternoon session. Teams from nine countries competed in the event. ==Schedule== All times are local time. Date Time Round 30 May 1931 18:00 Semi- finals 31 May 1931 18:15 Final ==Results== ===Semi-finals=== The semi-finals took place in the afternoon session starting at 18:00 (local time). The semi- finals consisted of two races where the top three teams of each heat qualified for the final. ====Semi-final 1==== Rank Country Names Time Notes 1 Anna Hřebřinová 52.0 Q 2 Nellie Halstead Muriel Cornell Daisy Ridgley - Q 3 Liesl Perkaus Veronika Kohlbach - Q 4 Lidia Bongiovanni \- 5 Jacqueline Combernoux Jacqueline Laudré Germaine Brisou Lucienne Velu - ====Semi-final 2==== Rank Country Names Time Notes 1 Lisa Gelius Tilly Fleischer Marie Dollinger 50.2 Q 2 Angela Petrović Silvia Capsali Irina Orendi Ilse Hausletner - Q 3 Zrnka Krajnović Vera Neferović Anita Batelkova Zulejka Stefanini - Q 4 Elise Van Truyen Jeanne Van Kesteren Lucie Petit Rosa Pelariaux - ===Final=== The final of the 4 × 100 metres relay event took place on 31 May 1931 during the afternoon session at 18:15 (local time). Rank Country Names Time Notes Nellie Halstead Muriel Cornell Daisy Ridgley 51.4 Lisa Gelius Tilly Fleischer Marie Dollinger 51.8 Anna Hřebřinová \- 4 Liesl Perkaus Veronika Kohlbach - 5 Angela Petrović Silvia Capsali Irina Orendi Ilse Hausletner - 6 Zrnka Krajnović Vera Neferović Anita Batelkova Zulejka Stefanini - ==Related pages== *Athletics at the 1930 Women's World Games – 4 × 100 metres relay *Athletics at the 1934 Women's World Games – 4 × 100 metres relay ==References== Category:Athletics at the Olympics of Grace
title: Athletics at the Olympics of Grace – 4 × 100 metres relay
